item.title: Annoying Little Compile Error!
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

you need public in front of it (identifier)
else you can use private but in this case you are using it from out side of server.java im guessing
so add public static
static will allow it to be used from out side sources

Read full topic

item.title: Annoying Little Compile Error!
item.dc:creator: @titans38120 titans38120
item.description:
@titans38120 wrote:

this little compile error wont go away! how do i fix it?

server.java:11: <identifier> expected gameison = new gameison(); ^ 1 error Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

and heres an excerpt (spelled right?) from my server.java where its located.

[code]public class server implements Runnable {

    gameison = new gameison();
public static gameison gameison = null;


public server() {// the current way of controlling the server at runtime and a great debugging/testing tool
    // jserv js = new jserv(this);
    // js.start();
}[/code]

Read full topic
